item.title: Reverie in the Moonlight launches November 25
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Roguelike action game dated.

Reverie in the Moonlight, a roguelike action game where players, along with their stuffed animals, must defend themselves from the monsters that attack in the night, will launch for PC via Steam on November 25 for 1,200 yen, developer room6 announced. It will support English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options. The original soundtrack will also be available to purchase.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

What if this dream never ended? What if we could dream it together?

Reverie in the Moonlight is an action game where, with the help of your stuffed animals, you try to defend yourself from the monsters attacking you night after night.

Nightly Visits

Little Tete’s nights are restless. His dreams are full of horrible monsters attacking him. But then, one night, he meets Luna, and she teaches him how to use his plushies to defend himself.

Cute But Strong

When faced with a monster, Tete can only do one thing: run away. His plushies, however, can actually fight and defeat monsters. Different animals play different roles, with some focusing on short-range attacks, some on long-range shots, and some on supporting their allies. There are 40 types to choose from, so find your favorites and help them protect Tete from the monsters.

  • Ham Jr. – Runs left and right, hitting monsters that get too close with a stick.
  • Snoozy-G – Enjoys sleeping, napping, and resting. Monsters that hit it are slowed down for a while.
  • Striped Angel – When it sees someone in trouble, it always wants to help. It heals Tete up from a distance.

Collect and Strategize

After the monsters’ attack is over, you can shop with the gold you found. You can get new plushies and even buy special items that can make you stronger. Some of them will also give you new weaknesses, so it’s up to you to strategize and prepare for the next attack in the best way possible. There are more than 100 items in the game… Will you be able to collect them all?

Change Clothes to Change Strategies

So, you’ve played the game’s story to the end. Well done. But this is just the start!

You can change Tete’s clothes, choosing from more than 20 costumes. Each one makes him stronger in some ways and weaker in others. If you want to help Tete defeat his nightmares, you’ll have to find the right plushies and items to go with each costume!

  • Moonlight Wizard – Plushies with long-range attacks become stronger, but Tete can only use those. Defending yourself becomes harder, so you’ll have to defeat monsters before they can get close.
  • Nap Cloud – Increasing attack power becomes difficult, but plushies that don’t move around attack twice as fast. Try to find as many stationary friends as you can.
  • Doggy Friend – Tete can only use dog plushies. If you want to win, you’ll need to make good use of their fast respawn speed.

item.title: Nintendo launches Switch 2 compatibility information website for Switch games
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

Check the compatibility of Switch software.

Nintendo has launched a website where users can check the compatibility of Switch games when played on Switch 2. The website includes information for both physical and digital versions of Switch software.

Users can search for any game available on Switch to check whether the game’s behavior on Switch 2 is consistent with Switch, or if behavior varies.

item.title: Resident Evil: Survival Unit launches November 17
item.content:encoded:
• Smartphone

The free-to-play mobile strategy game.

Free-to-play mobile strategy game Resident Evil: Survival Unit will launch for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play on November 17 at 6:00 p.m. PT / 9:00 p.m. ET, Aniplex and JOYCITY announced. It will be available in the countries listed hre, with South Korea, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macao, Vietnam, Indonesia, Brunei, Myanmar, and Mongolia to follow in early 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

Dive in the world of Resident Evil: Survival Unit for the ultimate survival experience, where strategy means everything!

In the world of Resident Evil: Survival Unit, strategy holds the key to survival. As an unknown infection spreads, the city crumbles in the blink of an eye. You are left stranded in the ruins with a group of isolated survivors. Build your base, secure resources, and expand your influence to carve out a path to survival!

Key Features

  • Deploy Survivors and Devise Your Strategy! – Combat, gathering, technology survivors with diverse skills await your command. Assign operatives to roles suited for each situation and build defensive lines to fend off the infected. Each move you make can tip the tide of battle and greatly increase your chances of survival.
  • Rebuild Your Base Amidst the Ruins – Center your efforts around an abandoned mansion, restoring its facilities one by one to lay the groundwork for survival. Strategically manage resources, defenses, and research to create a powerful stronghold!
  • Explore, Expand, and Evolve in a Chaotic World – As you scour the map for resources, you’ll encounter other survivor groups. Will you choose cooperation or conflict? Your decisions will shape the future! Your base will grow beyond being a mere safe-house, evolving into an impenetrable stronghold.
  • Plan With Strategy, Make Split-second Decisions, and Survive! – From building placement and operative deployment to combat loadout every choice you make will influence battlefield readiness in real time. Expand and reinforce your stronghold and forge alliances that lay the foundation to survive. Every decision directly impacts your chances of survival.
  • An Exclusive New Story That Goes Beyond the Resident Evil Series You Know and Love – Join iconic characters like Leon S. Kennedy, Claire Redfield, and Jill Valentine as they embark on a journey for survival. In this world where everything depends on strategy, your choices will shape the story.

Set in the world of Resident Evil: Survival Unit, rise above the fear.
